Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
SHPRCConstants Enumerates a series of constants used throughout the program.
 

Class Summary
AdminDialog Displays administrative tools for changing the back end.
Affiliation Stores credit and subsidy information about a student or community affiliation.
AffiliationDialog Draws the dialog view for updating, adding, and deleting affiliations in administrator view.
Category Stores information about a merchandise category, which is used to group similar items.
CategoryDialog Draws the dialog view for updating, adding, and deleting categories in administrator view.
Client Stores information about a client.
DialogController Connects an administrator dialog view to a runtime database to allow for back end updates.
HelveticaJButton Creates a JButton with the font pre-set to bold Helvetica of the specified size.
HelveticaJLabel Creates a JLabel with the font pre-set to bold Helvetica of the specified size.
PointOfSale The class that runs the application.
Product Stores information about a product.
ProductDialog Draws the dialog view for updating, adding, and deleting products in administrator view.
ProductJButton Creates a JButton formatted for displaying a product; also stores the product in question.
PurchaseController Serves as the controller in the MVC framework of a purchase and manages the main program execution.
PurchaseModel Serves the model in the MVC framework and stores information about a purchase, calculating totals based on the specified products and the current client.
PurchaseProductJButton Creates a JButton formatted for the purchased product list and stores the associated product.
PurchaseView Serves as the view in the MVC framework and displays products to be added to a purchase and the products in a purchase.
RuntimeDatabase SHPRC-POS RuntimeDatabase.java Stores back end information to be retrieved by the Purchase (Model in MVC class) at runtime and enables writes to the back end data base.
TotalDialog Displays a total and change due for a given purchase.
